# Everfull Mug
## Overview
**Aura** Faint; (DC 16) conjuration; **CL** 3rd

**Slot** — 

**Price** 200 gp

**Weight** —

**Description**

*This common-looking brown clay mug has persistent stains just under the rim.*

Three times per day, when you recite the command word, this mug fills with 12 ounces of water, cheap ale, or watery wine (your choice).

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Create Water (Spell)|create water]]*

**Cost** 100 gp

**Source:** Magic Item Compendium (WotC), pg. 160
